news.title: OpenAI launched GPT-5.3-Codex
news.summary: OpenAI introduced GPT-5.3-Codex with stronger agentic coding and faster execution for long-horizon technical work.

news.title: OpenAI introduced Frontier enterprise platform
news.summary: Frontier adds enterprise controls for deploying agents with shared context, permissions, and governance layers.

news.title: Anthropic released Claude Opus 4.6
news.summary: Opus 4.6 added stronger agentic coding performance and 1M-token context beta for larger workflows.

news.title: Anthropic said Claude will stay ad-free
news.summary: Anthropic committed to no ads in Claude conversations, emphasizing trust and user-aligned incentives.

news.title: Big Tech AI capex outlook nears $600B+
news.summary: Reuters and CNBC reported rising investor concern as 2026 AI infrastructure spend targets moved sharply higher.

news.title: Google framed as AI growth leader by some investors
news.summary: Reuters highlighted Google cloud and Gemini growth signals, while capex scale remained a key investor question.

news.title: AI companies increased creator marketing spend
news.summary: CNBC reported larger creator budgets as AI vendors pushed adoption through influencer and social channels.

news.title: Race to reduce dependency on Nvidia highlighted
news.summary: Coverage showed ongoing pressure for custom chips and alternate accelerators while Nvidia remains dominant.

news.title: Boards urged to push stronger AI accountability
news.summary: Reuters commentary highlighted governance pressure as regulation and enterprise AI accountability lag deployment speed.
